description: This file is a JavaScript module within the cross-spawn library, providing functionality to parse command execution configurations for different operating systems, particularly handling shell command parsing and shebang detection.

methods.name: detectShebang
methods.description: Detects if the command has a shebang and adjusts the command and arguments accordingly.

methods.name: parseNonShell
methods.description: Parses commands for non-shell execution contexts, especially on Windows, handling cmd.exe invocation and shebang processing.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Main function that normalizes arguments and delegates parsing to shell or non-shell handlers based on options.
